content: the backward loop method k1 raglan st knit 44 49 53 55 59 sts left back there are now a total of 193 217 237 249 265 sts on the needle for the body work in the round in stockinette stitch until the sweater measures between 40-50 cm 15 7-19 6 inches or to the desired length measured mid back incl neck edge work 5-9 cm 2-3½ inches in 1x1 rib k1 p1 on a 3 mm us2 5 circular needle bind off by using your favourite method or see video on hunglish knitter youtube channel sleeves the sleeves are worked in the round on 4 mm us6 circular needle using the magic loop technique place stitches back on the needle the work begins where you pick up the new stitches pick up 6 8 10 12 12 sts along the sts that were cast on at the underarm on the body there are now a total of 70 78 82 88 92 sts on the needle the work is set knit to the desired length above your elbow there are no decreases for short sleeve finish the sleeve in 1x1 rib k1 p1 knit the rib as wide as you wish in size small i knitted a 3 cm rib bind off by using your favourite method or see video on hunglish knitter youtube channel share your version of the hunglish lace tee on my instagram https //www instagram com/hunglishknitter/ happy knitting page 7 of 9 chart page 8 of 9 note you may make bobble with your preferred method but this is the way i do with crochet hook pull up a loop yarn over repeat pull up a loop yarn over pull up a loop one more time then yarn over the hook and pull through all five loops pull through one more time the stitch and let the bobble off left needle bring hook behind and through strand bellow slip st together with the last st on the hook transfer st to right needle for detailed instructions see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel https //www youtube com/@hunglishknitter page 9 of 9
